effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 794,993 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 304,649.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
